item.value: When a player IP is identified, we’ll show him for example the relevant brands from his country (based on the IP). The flow is:
I am sure we will resolve all issues within 10 days.
Уверен мы решим все вопросы в течении 10 дней.

When a player IP is identified, we’ll show him for example the relevant brands from his country (based on the IP). The flow is: IP identification IP reflecting the country source When tables are connected well , the filter will be automatically operated based on the country source We’ll also show him the website in his language with the correct currency (based on main languages per country and main currency)
Brands table - It means that for each brand, we’ll know all available payment methods, supported languages, supported currencies, our rank
Country table - It means that for each country, we’ll know the main language and the currency

I will provide you the data for all tables. License table - It means that for each license we’ll know if players from specific country are allowed to play or not (yesno) It means that for each license we’ll no if players from this country are allowed to play or not.
It means that for each license we’ll no if players from this country are allowed to play or not.
I will provide you the data for all tables. License table - It means that for each license we’ll know if players from specific country are allowed to play or not (yesno)

When a player IP is identified, we’ll show him for example the relevant brands from his country (based on the IP). The flow is: IP identification IP reflecting the country source When tables are connected well , the filter will be automatically operated based on the country source We’ll also show him the website in his language with the correct currency (based on main languages per country and main currency) Your example is also correct, the connection helps all the filters.
License table - It means that for each license we’ll know if players from specific country are allowed to play or not (yesno)
I will provide you the data for all tables.
Is it enough if we make these fields text in the admin panel for the "Casino"?
Достаточно ли если мы сделаем эти поля текстовыми в админ панели для "Casino"?
Достаточно ли если мы сделаем эти поля текстовыми в админ панели для "Casino".
Приложенного скриншота достаточно?
We would like to clarify the functionality of the "Casinos" fields in the "Commercial" block. What functionality will be associated with these fields?
Хотели бы уточнить функционал полей "Casinos" блок "Commercial". Какой функционал будет связан с этими полями?

What is the connection shown in the picture? Do we understand correctly, for example, "Country" is selected for "License". And when choosing "License" for "Brand", the "Country" value will match the selected "Brand" and work when filtering.

Что из себя представляют связь представленная на картинке? Верно ли мы понимаем, к примеру, Для "License" выбирается "Country". И при выборе "License" для "Brand" значение "Country" будет соответствовать выбранному "Brand" и работать при фильтрации.
Then it's not worth it, we will check this functionality earlier and in case of problems we will fix it.
Тогдa не стоит, мы проверим этот функционал ранее и в случае возникновения проблем исправим это.
Is there a new auction coming soon?
Есть новый аукцион в ближайшее время?
On test site I managed to repeat a similar problem when I renamed "Auction number" in auction
On test I managed to repeat a similar problem when I renamed "Auction number" in auction
На тестовом мне удалось повторить аналогичную проблему когда я переименовал "Auction number" in auction
Am I updating plugin?
Am I updating?
Я обновляю?
Did i updated plugin?
Did i update plugin?

Hello! Yesterday we had a problem with the fact that the client renamed the auction and we got a false auction on the client's website. We're back to the point where we need the auction id. Now we are working with a name that is not a unique and required field, which creates a lot of problems.

Вчера у нас возникла проблема с тем что клиент переименовал аукцион и у нас появился ложный аукцион на сайте клиента. Мы снова возвращаемся к моменту с тем что нам нужен id аукциона. Сейчас мы работаем с именем которое не является уникальным и обязательным полем, что порождает много проблем.
We will need an additional 4 hours to implement these points. Approve please.
Нам потребуется дополнительно 4 часа на реализацию этих моментов. Пожалуйста одобрите.
We can update the plugin, but we will need to check the auctions for possible problems.
Мы можем обновить плагин, но надо будет проверить работу аукционов на наличие возможных проблем.

Я удалил мусорный аукцион и добавил это в плагин для автоматического удаления таких аукционов.

We have not released a patch with this feature yet, I think it will be available tomorrow and I will update the plugin on the Ansuini website. Automatic updates are not available for them, it must be done manually.
Мы ещё не выпустили патч с этой фичей, думаю он будет доступен завтра и я обновлю плагин на сайте Ansuini. Автоматическое обновление у них не доступно, это надо делать в ручную.

There are no errors in the site. Your have two different auctions that are split over 3 days. Auction 3 and Auction 32021.
